TopicTitle: How to change control surface function mid-flight (can you?)

Articles.Content:
Is it possible to right-click a control surface mid-flight to toggle roll, yaw, pitch functions? I seem to remember doing this, but maybe it was available via a mod. It would make flight testing of planes much easier.

Thanks all!
Works for me. Maybe make sure you're right-clicking on an actual control surface, not a wing.

Weird! Okay, so I wasn't just seeing things before. Now I just need to determine what mod is hiding/masking that feature. FAR was adding info to the right-click that I then disabled. At the very least I know it's a usable feature.

Likely a combination of FAR and spaceplane parts, etc.

Thanks for the response.

[uPDATE] Some minor testing seems to indicate FAR completely. Right clicking a control surface only shows the stall % with it installed. Pulling FAR restores the usual menu.
